name: Spoki.lv - No index crap - No Ads.
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
@-moz-document url-prefix("http://spoki.tvnet.lv"), url-prefix("http://spokuspeles.tvnet.lv/"), url-prefix("http://www.spoki.tvnet.lv"), url-prefix("http://spoki.lv") {
div[class="panel"], 
div[id="followBar"], 
div[id="banner_10"], 
div[id="banner_75"], 
div[style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:3px;height:90px"], 
div[style="width: 250px; height: 250px; left: 0px; top: 0px; cursor: pointer;"], 
div[style="width:120px; font-size:11px; font-family:Verdana, Geneva, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"], 
div[id="labais1"], 
div[id="mod_eshops_b"], 
div[style="margin: 5px 0 0 0"], 
div[id="flo_adv_left"], 
div[id="scroll_ban1"], 
div[id="banner_225"], 
div[id="divi-banner2"], 
div[id="scroll_ban2"], 
div[class="news-box diena-news-box"], 
div[id="voteBlockFloat"], 
div[id="banner_197"], 
div[id="referer_top3"], 
div[id="addItem_comments1"], 
div[id="addItem_comments2"], 
div[class="iesakam"], 
div[id="top3_float"], 
div[id="coolBoxSocial"], 
div[id="banner_260"], 
div[id="divi-banner1"], 
table#m_content
{ display:none !important; }

}
